title: 15 Minute HIIT CARDIO INDOOR CYCLING WORKOUT
description:
When you are short on time and still want to kick butt, this will be your go-to cycling class! This 15 minute HIIT cardio cycling workout brings the heat! 🔥 With minimal recovery and maximum effort, your goals won't slip away even when life gets hectic and time is of the essence!

This 15 minute HIIT CARDIO cycling workout is part of our FIT for YOU fifteen series! All of the workouts in this series are short, spicy, and effective! You can find the strength FIT for YOU series on the Kaleigh Cohen Strength Channel to really help you boost your power, endurance, and get stronger! Now that you've finished your cardio, find strength here! https://www.youtube.com/KaleighCohenStrength

This cycling class is filled with powerful songs and choreography to get your heart pumping and your mood lifted in a time crunch!

Remember this is your workout! If you need a longer warmup before this ride find one here, https://youtu.be/EzEaTen6CMU 
Take longer recoveries when needed, pay attention to proper form, and give it ALL YOU'VE GOT!

I am so excited that you are here for this workout! Let’s kick some butt!

THE AFTER PARTY! 🔥🔥 WANT MORE?! Make the most of your workout with this quick Tabata Burner! https://youtu.be/zus6t02H8oM

💁🏼‍♀‍ Hello! I'm Kaleigh! I attended my first Spin class when I was 15. Since then I've been addicted to spin classes and indoor cycling. Now, as a certified Spin class Instructor, Stages Beats Instructor, and NASM certified fitness trainer, my goal is to share the most fun, motivating, and energizing indoor cycling workouts that will bring out your inner BUTT-KICKER!

I'm so glad you decided to join my indoor cycling class today! Grab your water bottle, grab your towel, get on your bike and let's kick some butt! - Kaleigh Cohen Fitness
_________________________________________________________________________________________________

0:00 - 2:12 WARM UP | Hello Hello by Chair Model
2:13 - 5:00 SPEED INCREASES | Rise Up by Emilio Rojas
5:01 - 7:38 SPRINTS | Clap Your Hands by Catiso
7:39 - 10:54 SPEED OVER SADDLE | Won't Let Up by Native 51
10:55 - 12:19 INVERTED SPRINTS | Let's Play by The Smocks
12:20 - 13:44 ROLLING HILLS | Just How We Do It by The Fancee
13:45 - 15:27 JUMPS/ FREEZES | Power Theatrical Trailer by Until The Very End
15:28 - 17:55 COOL DOWN | Take a Look Around by Paper Trees
_________________________________________________________________________________________________

New to my indoor cycling workouts? START HERE! 👉  https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBJ0TIYiwZzihdgD643Q_JZ-kvakaybNG

If you are doing a Spin class on a stationary bike or exercise bike instead of a spin bike and prefer to stay in the saddle, DO THIS:
2nd position: increase your speed! Try anywhere between 5-15 RPMs.
3rd position: increase your resistance and try and keep the same cadence. 
_________________________________________________________________________________________________

channelDescription:
Hello! I'm Kaleigh and I create CYCLE & STRENGTH training programs to challenge and transform you into an unstoppable force!

I'm here to help you CLIMB YOUR MOUNTAIN and SPRINT THROUGH THE STORM!

I am a certified Spin instructor, Stages Beats instructor, NASM certified personal trainer, and Girls Gone Strong Pre/ Postnatal coaching certified with over 13 years of experience coaching all over the world!

🔴 DISCLAIMER 🔴 When beginning any fitness workout or regimen, it is important to consult your physician to ensure this program is right for you. comments: I LOVE the music!!! Thank you for the positive upbeat music and lyrics!! No trash talking or explicit content!! 💗💗🤩🤩
Terrific addition to another ride❤🎉Thank you Kayleigh and Jason🎉❤
I love your workouts, but the pug gives me lifeeee🤣😍😍😆
We're on top of the world! These workouts are what push us to keep building micro habits every day, bringing us closer to the top!
Love this one, wish there were more 15 min’ers
